=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Les Misérables (2012) [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2019/01/22
Store: Hugh Jackman  (Actor),     Russell Crowe  (Actor),     Tom Hooper  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Drama
Product Description: ['Hugh Jackman, Academy Award® winner Russell Crowe and Anne Hathaway star in this critically-acclaimed adaptation of the epic musical phenomenon. Set against the backdrop of 19th-century France, Les Misérables tells the story of ex-prisoner Jean Valjean (Jackman), hunted for decades by the ruthless policeman Javert (Crowe), after he breaks parole. When Valjean agrees to care for factory worker Fantine\'s (Hathaway) young daughter, Cosette, their lives change forever. This enthralling story is a timeless testament to the survival of the human spirit and "an unforgettable experience" (Richard Roeper, RichardRoeper.com).', 'Bonus Content:', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The Stars of Les Misérable', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The Stars of Les Misérable', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The West End Connection', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The West End Connection', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables on Location', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables on Location', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Creating the Perfect Paris', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Creating the Perfect Paris', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Battle at the Barricade', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Battle at the Barricade', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables Singing Live', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables Singing Live', "The Original Masterwork: Victor Hugo's Les Misérables", "The Original Masterwork: Victor Hugo's Les Misérables", 'Feature Commentary with Director Tom Hooper', 'Feature Commentary with Director Tom Hooper', ']]>']

reference_summary:
Les Misérables (2012) [Blu-ray]
Hugh Jackman  (Actor),     Russell Crowe  (Actor),     Tom Hooper  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Drama
['Hugh Jackman, Academy Award® winner Russell Crowe and Anne Hathaway star in this critically-acclaimed adaptation of the epic musical phenomenon. Set against the backdrop of 19th-century France, Les Misérables tells the story of ex-prisoner Jean Valjean (Jackman), hunted for decades by the ruthless policeman Javert (Crowe), after he breaks parole. When Valjean agrees to care for factory worker Fantine\'s (Hathaway) young daughter, Cosette, their lives change forever. profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user enjoys musicals and dramatic storytelling, evidenced by their purchase of a well-known musical adaptation.
- **Format Choice:** Prefers Blu-ray format for movies, indicating a preference for high-quality visual and audio experiences.
- **Content Appreciation:** Shows appreciation for critically acclaimed works and those with well-known actors. Enjoys narrative depth and complex characters, as seen in their review of a classic literary adaptation.
- **Value Focus:** Values fast delivery and good pricing, suggesting a practical approach to purchasing.
- **Review Behavior:** Engages positively when rating products, evident from their high rating (5.0) and enthusiastic feedback about the purchase experience.
- **Re-Engagement Intent:** Expresses a willingness to buy again if not limited by prior purchases, reflecting an ongoing interest in similar content.

Overall, the user favors high-quality, award-winning films in the musical and drama categories, values efficient purchasing experiences, and is likely a repeat customer when satisfying their entertainment needs.
